Detailed Description

Determine if a not frequent itemset is near the positive border in the ABS algorithm.

In ABS, elements near the positive border are considered as frequent until the end of algorithm. The these "almost frequent" elements are used to find the underling elements of the positive border.

Member Function Documentation

template<class Iterator>
bool IsAlmostFreq::operator() (  Iterator  itElem  )  [inline]
 

Determine if a not frequent itemset is "near" the positive border.

A not frequent element X is "near", if (1 - supp( X ) /minsup < thresold
